snippet: Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee for mayor, is running his first campaign commercial of the general election — a documentary-style excerpt from his primary night victory speech.
abstract: Bill de Blasio, the Democratic nominee for mayor, is running his first campaign commercial of the general election — a documentary-style excerpt from his primary night victory speech.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign:  De Blasio Not Resting on Laurels
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: De Blasio Not Resting on Laurels
